===Etymology===
Penglai Palace was a nickname for Daming Palace (大明宮) of the [[w:Tang Dynasty|Tang Dynasty]]. It derived its nickname from the Penglai ponds that were located at the Palace. Because [[w:Mount Penglai|Mount Penglai]] also refers to a mystical land found in Chinese mythology, Penglai Palace can also be used as a nickname for a palace where celestial beings live.
